question.body: Which of the following organic molecule is correctly matched with its function?

multiple_choice.choice: Type I collagen is found in cartilage
Type II collagen is found in bone
Water increases compressive resistance in bone

response.feedback: Incorrect. Type I collagen is found in bone.
Incorrect. Type II collagen is found in cartilage.
Correct. Proteoglycans increase water retention and increase resilience of the tissue.
Incorrect. Although water contributes to the compressive resistance of bone, it is not an organic molecule.
